amendment.description: To prohibit the expenditure of certain amounts from the Land and Water Conservation Fund for land acquisition.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1209 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 29 - 64. Record Vote Number: 339.

action.text: Amendment SA 1209 proposed by Senator Lee to Amendment SA 948. (consideration: CR S6321) To prohibit the expenditure of certain amounts from the Land and Water Conservation Fund for land acquisition.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1209 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 29 - 64. Record Vote Number: 339.
